EmailTemplate.name: 1b. Associate Mentor Application Received >17
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!Job_Application__c.Roles__c} Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for applying for the role of {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}. As you will be over 17 years old during NCS with The Challenge 2014, we'll need you to complete a check with the Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) before you carry out your role.
This is nothing to worry about right now; the DBS check is completely free of charge to you and we'll help you to complete it.
We'll be in touch to let you know what needs to happen next.
